Programa de Segunda Generación de Reformas del Sector Saneamiento III
Proposal for a Loan for Second Generation Sanitation Sector Reform Program III

description.narrative: El presente programa se ha estructurado con los siguientes seis componentes: i) Estabilidad Macroeconómica; ii) Marco Institucional; iii) Política Financiera; iv) Política Tarifaria; v) Gestión de los Operadores; y vi) Participación del Sector Privado.

The program has been structured into the following six components: (i) macroeconomic stability; (ii) institutional framework; (iii) financial policy; (iv) rate policy; (v) operator management; and (vi) private sector participation.
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2014
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2014
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2015
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2016
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2015
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2016
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2017
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2017
Loan repayment in third quarter of 2017
